document_data.mainbody:
lukk Dannath was a human man of the city of Yartar on the Savage Frontier in northwest Faer√ªn.
Dannath was a short, red-haired man with a bristly beard. He used two thick monocles to see.
He was a proprietor of Dannaths Pickles, Nuts, & Foods, which sold foods for travellers in the North. He ran the store with the aid of this three strong, quiet daughters. One of his daughters was adopted, but all three were skilled fighters and Harpers.
